description: Jelly glue sheet(a piece of 24 stickers)
PRESS ON NAILS HOW TO WORK
Gently rub the nail slices with a nail stick to remove the surface cuticles, rinse off and keep the nails clean and dry
Choose the size that best suits your nails, taking free jelly glue on the inside of the selected nail plate

Press the false nails on your own nails and hold them for 30 seconds. Please after you wear the false nail try not to get your hands wet within 2 hours. Trim according to the shape and length of the press on the nail you want
Liquid glue or adhesive tabs. You can use liquid glue for firmness. Jelly glue has limited durability, it is recommended that you use your own glue.
Soak your nails in warm water and gently peel off the pre-glued nails from the side after a few minutes
Remove the glue sticker and keep the fake nail tip for next time use
Never break or pull nails off, This may damage your natural nails.
Please do not leave the fake nails in water for a long time, it will make the nails fall off easily.
